review: Talk about very Excellent services we sat down had abut of a conversation we got serve by a beautiful young lady who was fully understanding and supportive she ask what was the special occasion of coming and we told her it was my friends birthday she smiled and took her drinks and orders Food side the food was amazing my friend was Pleased that his steak was cooked right and when she came back to ask if we needed anything else we all said no she was about to head to the kitchen and I stopped her and asked if she could make a balloon tiara and she said yes so we waited and all the staff came announced to everyone that we're singing happy birthday to my friend and he started laughing and enjoying it all we shall be coming back for more food :)

It has been years since I'd been here. I always stay away from the mixed drinks and they're over priced and not much alcohol. Soft drinks are free refills which is always a plus. The Jack Daniels sesame seed chicken is still a stand out item on their menu. You can now load your fries with Sam Adams Beer Cheese, however it's very overpriced at a Â£2 up charge for literally a tablespoon of cheese sauce.

Always been a big fan of T.G.I Fridays love the Jack Daniels glaze myself and my friends went there to celebrate my friend birthday we arrived 6:35 and our table was booked for 7 we arrived and were greeted by the very polite staff who seated us straight away about 5 mins after we sat down we ordered the unlimited coke as soon as we drank once glass without asking they brought another over myself and my friend both had steak and unlike most cheaper places I ask for Mine well done it was so nice and tender all freshly cooked after we had finished we asked for the bill and before that out comes a few staff with a big free slice of cake to sing happy birthday to my friend it was a great evening and good value money we will definitely be returning soon
